poem:
### The Politicization of Science

In sterile halls where silence hums,  
truth once held—now whispered,   
cloaked under the guise of authority,  
facts lose their footing,  
as serpentine figures dance,  
cut cords of insight with  
hands that sway  
not to reason,  
but to the clattering of power's  
discordant,  
deafening  
drum.
